name: Tyrfing
status: Str ＋10, Agi ＋10, Dex ＋10, All Attributes ＋8, Hit ＋50, Atk ＋16%, Dmg ＋12%, Demi-Human Race Damage ＋30%, Max HP ＋17000

name: Tyrfing Reforged
status: Str ＋10, Agi ＋10, Dex ＋10, All Attributes ＋14, Hit ＋50, Atk ＋20%, Dmg ＋15%, Demi-Human Race Damage ＋40%, Max HP ＋26000, Dmg Reduc. ＋5%, Magic Reduc. ＋5%, Tyr's power will cure all diseases and abnormal states in the effecting area. All allies within a 8-meter radius will gain [Tyre's Blessing]. [Tyre's Blessing]: immediately restores 25% of Max HP, removes all abnormal states ( states incurable by Panacea included), and immunize abnormal states; this effect lasts 5 seconds; CD: 180 seconds.
